actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for any individual a credit against income tax for amounts paid or incurred for the improvement of such individual's principal residence.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a taxpayer an income tax credit for three percent of the expenses paid or incurred for the improvement of his principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for any individual a credit against income tax for amounts paid or incurred for the improvement of such individual's principal residence.
